Critical.description:
If the result can be considered as a critical
Critical is compared to the "natural" dice result, so any modifier doesn't count

failure.description:
The value that will be considered as a failure.
Can only be compared strictly with the natural dice result

success.description:
The value that will be considered as a success
Can only be compared strictly with the natural dice result

onNaturalDice.description: If "true", the comparison will be made on the natural dice result, without any modifier, including the statistics bonus if any.

value.description: Can be a simple value, or a formula, including the statistics with $

$schema.description:
Specifies the URL for the schema definition
This property is optional and should contain a valid URI.

charName.description: Allow to force the user to choose a name for them characters

critical.description: How the success/echec will be done

customCritical.description: Custom critical, allow to adjust the critical on a statistic, and set multiple critical value

diceType.description: A dice type in the notation supported by the bot

combinaison.description:
The combinaison that can be made with ANOTHER statistic
Automatically disable the max/min value

max.description: The value of the statistic that can take the stats

min.description: The minimal value of the statistic that can take the stats

statistics.description: The statistics that can be used in the dice throw

total.description:
A total can be set, it allows to calculate the total value of a future register member
If the sum of the value > total, the bot will send a message to the user to inform him that the total is exceeded and an error will be thrown
